website_summaries.verdict: Durable size 5 rugby ball made for high-level training and games.
pros: Includes a hydratec surface that allows the ball to repel water successfully
Durable materials in this ball that ensure it will perform well for many practice sessions and games
cons: May need to be re-inflated often

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Its a rugby ball and rugby is fun so hence this ball is fun.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Millard

customer_reviews.title: Every 1star review here are just complaints due to lack of knowledge on what theyre purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for the price. Grippy, good for kicking. I really like the vibrant colors because my eyesight is garbage it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Set

customer_reviews.title: Need to be re-pumped often
customer_reviews.text: Good ball. But it needs to be re-pumped more often than some of my others
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Deflated ball
customer_reviews.text: There was no air in the ball. It was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Well the texture is great and all
customer_reviews.text: Well the texture is great and all, just becarefull when you fill it, I lost the air tube inside the ball and probably broke three of them trying to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner, tacky nice quality ball, had no problems airing it up :) 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, has to get a little use before it shapes up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball
customer_reviews.text: If you are a rugby fan, this ball is for you. Classic look and feel. Just an amazing ball.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had the ball for a while now and used it in a few pick up games. It held its tackiness for a lot longer than I expected it too and just recently lost it. Good when kicked and thrown.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome! It arrived as described
customer_reviews.text: Gilbert is the Standard rugby ball. It is as it should be. It's awesome! It arrived as described. It really did take a while to get here, but it was within the estimated shipping dates....so, no harm no foul. Also, I ordered it around the holidays, so it's not too surprising that it took a bit to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Lanek

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great! I was very happy to get it, i have been looking for a good rugby ball for a while and the shipping is always ridiculous on them. Finally got it and it is hand made and the craftsmanship is great and this ball has incredible grip. On top of all that it came in earlier than the date which is always good!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: air issues
customer_reviews.text: needs to be re-pumbed constantly, and it won't hold air for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Nick jennette

customer_reviews.title: World standard in rugby balls.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rugby ball. Very grippy. Worry that the color will scuff off with use. New design with valve in the seam makes the seams a little lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D.

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, doesn't hold air
customer_reviews.text: When I got the ball some of the seams looked worn stretched or poorly made and on top of that it loses half its air every 3 days or so.
customer_reviews.author: Seamus Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The balls were flat. When I mean flat I mean they had holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ball.
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised. Good ball. Inflated without any problems. It looks like it will stand up to the punishment ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to be a real size 5. Good quality though
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.text: No problem getting the correct color. Just as described! Great gift for my nephew! He was very pleased as well.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Rugby Ball
customer_reviews.text: Not too many places around to get rugby balls....so I took a chance. My son said it was great, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wanger

customer_reviews.title: Wrong ball
customer_reviews.text: I received this ball in the wrong color, and then i sent it back and i still got the same color... i called them and the lady was not helpful at all...
customer_reviews.author: Erin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Rugby ball
customer_reviews.text: It had a hole in it. And the ball lost its shape by the time it got to my home.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: there is defect that cause it to deflate slowly!. couldn't figure it out early ! Cannot return to :(
customer_reviews.text: there is defect that cause it to deflate slowly!. couldn't figure it out early ! Cannot return to :(
customer_reviews.author: Tharindu

customer_reviews.title: Paint
customer_reviews.text: The blue and red paint of the ball comes of quickly. If used it one time and it's almost no paint in the ball. I don't recomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo Herrea

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The photo of the yellow/orange ball is mislabeled. If you order this one you will actually receive the blue/black one. Not sure what colors you'll get by choosing the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Daycare Lady

product_meta.title: Gilbert Photon Match Rugby Ball (Size 5)
product_meta.description: The Photon is a high-quality match ball for any level of play. Perfect for game play or elite-level training that requires perfect accuracy.
feature_bullets: Truflight valve in seam for accurate flight

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
